title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data sources (HRMS, CRM, timesheets etc.), data integration methods (ETL, real-time streaming, APIs etc.), performance reporting components (dashboards, charts, alerts), data security considerations (encryption, anonymization, access controls), and consider incorporating microservices architecture for scalability and modularity. Also, provide a clear outline of the data flow within the system, with special focus on modularity, maintainability, and performance optimizations. Incorporate design patterns to ensure efficient data handling and processing. Lastly, propose potential solutions for horizontal scaling to handle large volumes of data.

title: Data Source Integration
description: Identify and integrate various data sources for performance data.

title: Data Transformation and Consolidation
description: Develop processes to transform and consolidate performance data from different sources into a unified format.

title: Performance Reporting and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface and reporting tools for performance data visualization.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing and managing performance data.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure system functionality and performance.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, automate deployment processes, and implement monitoring and logging.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide user training for the PerformanceDataIntegrator system.
